records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING FOR THE CONTROL OF EARLY SHOOT BORER IN SUGARCANE CROP?
records.KccAns: FOR THE CONTROL OF EARLY SHOOT BORER IN SUGARCANE CROP, PLS APPLY REGENT-10KG OR 8KG CARTAP HYDROCHLORIDE OR SPRAY-500ML MONO.+100ML NUVAN IN 150LITE WATER.
suggested 15 may to 15 june.

records.QueryText: farmer want to know information about How to control caterpillars in soyabean crop?
records.KccAns: Spray emamectin benjoate or corajan or fem 10 ml at 15 liter of water or indoxa carb 10 ml at 15 liter of water.
